text: Uftyuga may refer to several rivers in Northern Russia: * Uftyuga (Northern Dvina), a tributary of the Northern Dvina in Arkhangelsk Oblast * Uftyuga (Sukhona), a tributary of the Sukhona in Vologda Oblast * Uftyuga (Kokshenga), a tributary of the Kokshenga in Vologda Oblast * Uftyuga (Lake Kubenskoye), a tributary of Lake Kubenskoye in Vologda Oblast
title: Uftyuga
